character.statement: Watch your valuables! There are thieves about.
The sultan holes himself up in the palace with his riches, while the people are terrorized by the 40 thieves!
I've tried to sneak into the palace, but the guards are too quick.
The view from the top is amazing! You can see the whole desert.
I can tell you have a good eye! This is, indeed, a magical lamp.
My spyglass will let you see things you could never have imagined.
Isn't this the most beautiful camel you've ever seen? Shame about the biting...
If you can control him, this camel will follow you just about anywhere.
Looks like they left something behind.
So that's where their hideout is!
Looks like it's meant to hold a spyglass.
